com.github.maxstupo.flatengine.map.tile

Class TilesetStore

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.maxstupo.flatengine.map.tile.TilesetStore

  • public class TilesetStore
extends java.lang.Object
    This class allows for storage of multiple tilesets, and allows for caching of tiles by global id.
    Author:
    Maxstupo

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TilesetStore()

      Returns a sprite referenced by a global id.

      Returns the tileset that has the given first global id.
      Tileset getTilesetByName(java.lang.String name)
      Returns the first tileset that has a name that matches the given name.
      java.util.Collection<Tileset> getTilesets()
      Returns an unmodifiable collection of all tilesets within this store.
      int hashCode() 
      TilesetStore recacheTiles()

      • TilesetStore

        public TilesetStore()

    • Method Detail

      • addTileset

        public TilesetStore addTileset(Tileset tileset,
                               boolean useTilesetGlobalIds)
        Adds a given tileset to this store.
        Parameters:
        tileset - the tileset to add.
        useTilesetGlobalIds - if true Tileset.getFirstGid() is used instead of the index within this store.
        Returns:
        this object for chaining.

      • recacheTiles

        public TilesetStore recacheTiles()
        Converts all stored tilesets into a single array of tiles allowing for fast access to each tile.

        Call this method after adding all tilesets.

        Returns:
        this object for chaining.

      • getTilesetByFirstGid

        public Tileset getTilesetByFirstGid(int firstgid)
        Returns the tileset that has the given first global id.
        Parameters:
        firstgid - the first global id of the tileset.
        Returns:
        the tileset that has the given first global id.

      • getTilesetByName

        public Tileset getTilesetByName(java.lang.String name)
        Returns the first tileset that has a name that matches the given name.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the tileset.
        Returns:
        the first tileset that has a name that matches the given name.

      • getTilesets

        public java.util.Collection<Tileset> getTilesets()
        Returns an unmodifiable collection of all tilesets within this store.
        Returns:
        an unmodifiable collection of all tilesets within this store.

      • getTileByGlobalId

        public Tile getTileByGlobalId(int gid)
        Returns a sprite referenced by a global id. If recacheTiles() hasn't been called yet it will be.

        If the given id is out of bounds null will be returned.

        Parameters:
        gid - the global id of the tile.
        Returns:
        the sprite representing the tile, or null if the given id is out of bounds.
